    Charmander - Class in Unnamed Package

    checkForMulligan(ArrayList<Card>) - Method in class Card
    The checkForMulligan method checks to see if the current hand has no pokemon in it.
    checkForRetreat() - Method in class Pokemon
    The checkForRetreat method checks to see if this Pokemon object can retreat from active status.
    checkIfAttackIsValid(Attack) - Method in class Pokemon
    The checkIfAttackIsValid method checks to see if the player can use that attack by checking the number of energies required for the attack.
    coinFlip() - Method in class PokemonCardGame
    The flipCoin method flips a coin and returns if it is heads or tails.
    createHand() - Method in class Player
    The createHand method creates a new hand of 7 cards for a player.
